Authors: Manoj Kumar A, C K Pradeep, K B Vrinda
Title:
Two new species of Crepidotus (Basidiomycota, Agaricales)
from peninsular India
Abstract:
Two new species, Crepidotus volubilis and Crepidotus
palodensis are described from Kerala State, India based on morphological
and molecular (nLSU) phylogenetic data. The new taxa were assigned to
section Echinospori due to the verrucose basidiospores and presence of
clamp connections in the hyphae. Comprehensive description, photographs
and comparisons with phenetically similar and phylogenetically related
species are discurssed. The nrLSU based phylogenetic analysis performed
using Maximum Likelihood (ML) method, supported the novelty of the
species
